iopair.name: C-C476F-OSSL-01-ST01-DT07-DF13-CF22-01-GOOD-10
iopair.description: Generate SSL certificate and private key Good inputs: 1) environment variable contains any number <= 511,2) Environment variable contains string that is not a number Bad input: 1) environment variable not set 2) environment variable contains any number >= 512
iopair.run_command: req -new -newkey rsa:2048 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -keyout good-10/server.key -out good-10/server.crt -subj "/C=SP/ST=The Moon/L=TheDarkSide/O=KSP/OU=Moon Department/CN=ksp.moon"

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-10-1 AND GOOD-10-2 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
